summary: Vinni-Pukh is trying to help his friend donkey with huge depression which happened to be on his birthday
cast: Vladimir Osenev|Evgeniy Leonov|Iya Savvina|Erast Garin|Zinaida Naryshkina
director: Directors: Fyodor Khitruk (as F. Khitruk), Gennadiy Sokolskiy (as G. Sokolskiy)
title: Vinni-Pukh i den zabot
